# Copilot Instructions

## Language

- Please prefer Russian for reply.
- Use English for all code comments and docstrings.

## README

- Do not generate README files automatically.

## Merge Request Commits

- Write commit messages in English
- Use imperative mood: "Add feature" not "Added feature"
- Keep subject line concise (50 characters or less)
- Separate subject from body with a blank line
- Wrap body text at 72 characters
- Use bullet points for multiple changes
- Reference issue numbers when applicable: "Fixes #123" or "Closes #456"
- Group related changes into logical commits
- Provide context in the commit body explaining why the change was made
- Follow conventional commits format when applicable:
  - `feat:` for new features
  - `fix:` for bug fixes
  - `refactor:` for code refactoring
  - `docs:` for documentation changes
  - `chore:` for maintenance tasks
